text: Hell Hunters is a 1988 German/American horror film produced and directed by , and starring Maud Adams, George Lazenby and Stewart Granger. ==Plot== A Nazi war criminal mad scientist creates a spider serum which turns people into Nazi zombies. A team of investigators that have devoted their lives hunting Nazi war criminals endeavor to stop him.. ==Cast== * Maud Adams as Amanda * Stewart Granger as Martin Hoffmann * Candice Daly as Ally * Rômulo Arantes as Tonio * Russ McCubbin as Kong * George Lazenby as Heinrich * Eduardo Conde as El Pasado * William Berger as Karl * Herb Andress as Johann ==Release== ===Home media=== It was announced on June 1, 2016 that Film Chest would be releasing the film for the first time on DVD later that year. The DVD included a fully restored HD version of the film taken from its original 35mm print.
